description: This vegan Moussaka is made with a lentil filling, roasted vegetables and a dairy-free Bechamel sauce. It's ideal for a weeknight dinner that's hearty and flavorful - vegans and non-vegans alike will love it! Also freezer-friendly and easy to make gluten-free.
keywords: bell peppers, carrot, earth of maria, eggplant, lentils, Mushrooms, Potatoes, tomatoes, vegan butter
name: Vegan Moussaka With Lentils
recipeIngredient: 1 large red bell pepper (de-seeded and diced)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees C/350 F and line a large baking tray with parchment paper.
Prepare the potatoes and eggplant by slicing them into thin circles, then transfer to a large mixing bowl. Drizzle with olive oil, and stir together well.
Arrange the vegetables on the baking tray, and bake for 25 minutes, until crispy and fully cooked through.

video.description: This vegan Moussaka is made with a lentil filling, roasted vegetables and a dairy-free Bechamel sauce. It's ideal for a weeknight dinner that's hearty and flavorful - vegans and non-vegans alike will love it! Also freezer-friendly and easy to make gluten-free.
video.name: Vegan Moussaka With Lentils
